s.text: There was little reported progress in the search for the bombers, though a Kenyan daily newspaper quoted witnesses who recalled seeing a man waiting in a pickup truck Friday morning in the alley behind the embassy, where the bomb exploded.
In other front-page news--rather, news of the front page--the Monica story retreated inside for the first time in weeks.
In other front-page news--rather, news of the front page--the Monica story retreated inside for the first time in weeks.
The lead at the New York Times details the launching of an organized international rescue operation, replacing the heroic but chaotic efforts to date.
